function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of understanding the health implications of indoor microbial communities","Impact":"Increased risk of exposure to harmful indoor microbial communities","Mitigation":"Conducting future studies to understand the health implications of indoor microbial communities","Technologies":"Microbial analysis technology for identifying and classifying indoor microbial communities","People":"Building occupants, architects, researchers","Owner":"Researchers, architects, building occupants"},{"Description":"Unintentional promotion of harmful indoor microbiome through design choices","Impact":"Potential negative impact on human health and well-being","Mitigation":"Implementing architectural design strategies that promote beneficial indoor microbial communities","Technologies":"Eco-friendly building materials, ventilation systems, and microbial analysis technology","People":"Architects, building occupants","Owner":"Architects, building occupants"},{"Description":"Impact of beta-diversity metric choice on research results","Impact":"Potential distortion of research findings and conclusions","Mitigation":"Careful selection of beta-diversity metric, validation of results using multiple metrics","Technologies":"Multivariate community analysis, taxonomic metric selection","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Researchers"}]}
